instruction: Create a table listing the advantages/disadvantages of using a laptop as compared to a desktop computer.
output:
Advantages of a Laptop vs. a Desktop Computer

Advantages of Laptops | Advantages of Desktop Computers
--- | --- 
Portability | More power and processing speed
Low maintenance | More custom options available
Cheaper price | More storage capacity
Smaller size | Lower noise levels
Ease of use | More upgrade-able

Disadvantages of Laptops | Disadvantages of Desktop Computers 
--- | --- 
Less power and processing speed  | More expensive 
More limited custom options | Difficult to move 
Less storage capacity | Higher maintenance
Higher noise levels | Less portability 
Less upgrade-able |
